String createOrderByClause (String[] list)

Detailed Description

A class for creating SQL queries.

Todo:
getItems() and deleteItems do not support varchar (=String) type search fields as the values should be enclosed in single quotes. This is done in addItem() but since I don't need this feature it has not been implemented.
Author:
mep

Definition at line 13 of file SqlQueryEngine.java.

String[]  idFields,
String[]  ids 
) [virtual]

Builds an SQL query to delete items from the database.

Parameters:
table Table name. Mandatory.
idField Field names for the query. If this is null, contents of the entire table is cleared.
id Id values for the query. Must be in the same order as the fields in idField. If this is null, contents of the entire table is cleared.
Returns:
SQL query string.

String ScheatorDb.SqlQueryEngine.formatValue ( Field  f  )  [package]

Formats a value for an sql query.

This function assumes that the field type is equivalent to the field in the database. In practice this means that this field support two types of fields: string (varchar) and numeric.

A string type field will be escaped with single parenthesis (') because SQL databases expect that. Numbers are returned as-is.

If the field is null, a string containing "NULL" is returned instead.

Parameters:
f The field where the value is.
Returns:
Formatted value.

String ScheatorDb.SqlQueryEngine.getItems ( String[]  table,
String[]  fields,
String[]  idFields,
String[]  ids,
String[]  orderBy 
) [virtual]

Returns an SQL query for retrieving information from a database.

Todo:
get and delete do not add escape characters for String type fields.
Parameters:
table Table names.
fields Field names. If this is null, * is used.
idFields Fields used to query the database. If this is null, every row is returned.
ids Values for the id fields. Must be in the same order as the idFields. If this is null, every row is returned.
Returns:
SQL query string.

Implements ScheatorDb.AbstractQueryEngine.

String ScheatorDb.SqlQueryEngine.updateItem ( String  entity,
Object  toUpdate,
String[]  idFields,
String[]  ids 
) [virtual]

Creates an SQL query for updating a row's values in the database.

Parameters:
entity Table name.
toUpdate Fields and values to update. All of the fields will be updated, so each field must have a meaningful value!
idFields Fields used to identify the row(s).
ids Id values for id fields. Values must be in the same order as the fields.
Returns:

Implements ScheatorDb.AbstractQueryEngine.
